name: Tamagotchi Hell (Sollarium Studio, Tiago Cruz, Leonardo Dantas, Gabriel Cassimiro)
name_original: Tamagotchi Hell (Sollarium Studio, Tiago Cruz, Leonardo Dantas, Gabriel Cassimiro)
description:
Game submitted to Bullet Hell Jam 2022 developed in 10 days. 

Theme: CONFINED.

Remember the time when you couldn't stop thinking about the good old bullet hells you played on a tamagotchi?... Well, neither i but what about being locked inside one while you try to keep yourself alive?

Controls:  Team:
  • Gabriel Cassimiro - Programmer
  • Leonardo Dantas - Game Designer
  • Tiago Cruz - 3D Artist
